settings.tab_text:
• Dry Clean Only.
  • Do Not Shrink.
  • Do Not Bleach.
  • Do not wash in Machine
  • Dry in Shade.
  • Do Not Wring
settings.tab_text_two: Add text which will be shown in tabs across all product pages with product tag bridal_disclaimer

settings.tab_text:
We take great care in presenting our products accurately on our website. However, please be aware that actual colors, textures, and sizes may slightly vary due to factors beyond our control, such as individual screen settings and manufacturing processes. Kindly refer to the product description for accurate details such as sizing, fabric, and care instructions.
Reach out to our customer support team if you have any questions regarding URGENT deliveries, before making your purchase.

Stitched articles come with trousers tailored to match the unstitched trouser fabric provided. Please note that any appearance of shararas/ghararas in product images is for shoot purposes only.
settings.tab_text_two:
We take great care in presenting our products accurately on our website. However, please be aware that actual colors, textures, and sizes may slightly vary due to factors beyond our control, such as individual screen settings and manufacturing processes. Kindly refer to the product description for accurate details such as sizing, fabric, and care instructions.
Reach out to our customer support team if you have any questions regarding URGENT deliveries, before making your purchase.

Stitched articles come with tailored stitching same as shown in the picture, with laces and tassels included. Deep necklines are for shoot purposes only. The actual necklines will be modest and tailored according to the size.

settings.heading: Image with text overlay
settings.subheading: Use overlay text to give your customers insight into your brand. Select imagery and text that relates to your style and story.

settings.heading: Image with text
settings.text: Pair text with an image to add details about your products, brand and selling proposition.
